item.description:
The French Bulldog Club of America is hosting the National French Bulldog Specialties at the Holiday Inn in Boxborough. On Thursday October 15th there will be a Parade of Rescues at lunch time featuring adopted rescue dogs!

There will be ribbons and a special gift for all participants. They welcome anyone who has adopted a French Bulldog from a shelter, Humane Society, FBRL, FBCR, FBV or FBRN, as well as participants who have gotten their dogs as retirees from breeders or Frenchies who have been "rehomed."

You can find more info about the parade here http://www.frenchbull... and about the National Specialty in general here http://www.frenchbull... .

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: FBDCA Parade of Rescues @ the 2009 Specialty in Boxborough, MA
